Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Add a call to GC.SuppressFinalize inside your Dispose method.s")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("The type has a finalizer and implements IDisposable. However it doesn't call System.GC.SuppressFinalize inside Dispose.")

Docs.summary: This rule catches a common problem when a type has a finalizer (called a destructor in C#) and implements System.IDisposable. In this case the Dispose method should call System.GC.SuppressFinalize to avoid the finalizer to be, needlessly, called.
Docs.remarks: Prior to Gendarme 2.2 this rule was named IDisposableWithDestructorWithoutSuppressFinalizeRule
